channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 unforgettable winter-only dining experiences at hotels around the world

item.title: Baltimore eyes a Southwest lounge as it preps new concourse for the airline
item.description: Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport (BWI) is about to open a big, new concourse for Southwest Airlines travelers.

item.title: Deal of the day: Fly to Australia or New Zealand from 17,000 Delta miles
item.description: You can currently book flights to Australia or New Zealand from only 17,000 Delta miles throughout the first quarter of 2026.

item.title: These are the best new hotels that opened in 2025

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred cardholders: Why the Venture X is worth adding next
item.description: Learn how you can maximize your travel rewards by pairing the Capital One Venture X and the Chase Sapphire Preferred.
